description: This Italian-inspired recipe puts a twist on the classic Caprese salad with the classic flavour combo of fresh basil, tomato and mozzarella.
keywords: Roast vegetable,Pescatarian,Roast,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Spring,Low sugar,Nov 2020,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Tomato,Peanut free
name: Roasted Tomatoes With Mozzarella & Basil Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Cut a 2cm-thick slice from tops of each tomato. Reserve tops.
Place tomato bases in a baking dish. Arrange 1 mozzarella slice over each tomato, followed by a basil leaf. Sandwich with reserved tomato tops.
Place garlic, oil, vinegar and sugar in a small bowl, whisking until combined. Drizzle over tomatoes and roast for 12 minutes or until mozzarella has melted and tomatoes begin to blister.
Coarsely chop remaining basil and add to pan juices. Season and serve
